<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Premonition of Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1707) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 123 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You fail a saving throw against a [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect.

</column>

---

Your deity sends you a vision of faith to steel you against mental attacks. Reroll the triggering saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus. You must use the second result, even if it's worse.

<title level="2">Premonition of Clarity leads to...</title>
[Shared Clarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1710)
name: Premonition of Clarity
